WaterDetection 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    • WaterDetection

Generates a csv file that contains several rows of information, namely number of Water Cells and Non Water Cells, prints time spent and names the files acordding to the Threshold provided. Accepts a list of lists where each element is a list of all 12 months for a specific year and specific ZOI;

Source: R/GenerateCSV_1_2.R
GenerateCSV2.Rd

Generates a csv file that contains several rows of information, namely number of Water Cells and Non Water Cells, prints time spent and names the files acordding to the Threshold provided. Accepts a list of lists where each element is a list of all 12 months for a specific year and specific ZOI;

GenerateCSV2(
  Albufeira_List_of_Lists,
  ExportPath,
  Year,
  ID_list,
  ProductName,
  Threshold1,
  Threshold2
)

Arguments

Albufeira_List_of_Lists

A list of lists, where the first element is a list of all 12 months of a product for ZOI 1; Usually a list of lists of Binary_NDVI cut to each ZOI;

ExportPath

a path to export the .csv files;

Year

a string to represent the agricultural year, ex: 2017 or Ano Agricola 2017

ID_list

a list of IDs representing the amount of unique shapes inside the original shapefile, usually created asa global variable using CropShapefile_ExportToPath;

ProductName

a Product Name to be printed in the files name, ex: BinaryNDVI or Combo;

Threshold1

a number representing the threshold used in the files that originate the csv, like 0 for NDVI;

Threshold2

a number representing the threshold used in the files that originate the csv, mostly 800 for RGBSum;

Value

returns an organized list of dataframes that include a dataframe for each ZOI, representing an entire year of imagery, with stats such as number of Water Cells, Non Water cells, etc;

Contents
